music.title: Non stop
music.lyrics: I just flipped the switch. I don't. Bodies start to drop, ayy, hit the floor. Money for revenge, man, that's hardly an expense. Palace look like Buckingham. Niggas that I knew from when I started in this shit. This a Rollie, not a stopwatch, shit don't ever stop.

music.title: Trip
music.lyrics: Oooh, yeah, yeah. I put my feelings on safety. So I don't go shootin' where your heart be. And that's a whole lotta love, ain't tryna waste it. Baby boy, your love, got me trippin' on you. My bad, my bad for, trippin' on you (Trippin' on you). My bad, my bad for, trippin' on you (Trippin' on you). Trippin' on you, yeah yeah

music.title: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
music.lyrics: Mama, take this badge off of me. I can't use it anymore. It's gettin' dark, too dark to see. I feel like I'm knockin' on heaven's door. Knock, knock, knockin' on heaven's door. Knock, knock, knockin' on heaven's door.

music.title: Crazy
music.lyrics: I go, I go, I go, I go. A real woman 'bout her paper. Yeah, yeah, yeah. I kill 'em, I kill 'em, I kill 'em with compassion. Niggas don't know where I came from. Live for the challenge, only makes me stronger. You never could say I'm lacking. I'm just countin', countin' blessing's.

music.title: Losing Focus
music.lyrics: I flew a stripper in tonight. We shared intimate nights. And we shared. How do we save it. And I know it don't make no sense. 'Cause thes–µ conversations been bone dry. Give me dirty looks 'cause they know a lot. See I'm losin' all my focus. Cruisin' in this cold Benz. Oh, oh, yeah, yeah. All my niggas told me, You gotta stop your distractions.Focused, focused, focused (yeah).

music.title: Trip
music.lyrics: Oooh, yeah, yeah. I put my feelings on safety. So I don't go shootin' where your heart be. And that's a whole lotta love, ain't tryna waste it. Baby boy, your love, got me trippin' on you. My bad, my bad for, trippin' on you (Trippin' on you). My bad, my bad for, trippin' on you (Trippin' on you). Trippin' on you, yeah yeah
